div.p: This value set expansion contains 5 concepts.

td.a: Child's birth when client's biological sex is female-34

tr.td: Child's birth when client's biological sex is female

td.a: First HPV dose from the primary series was administered-112

tr.td: First HPV dose from the primary series was administered

td.a: Second HPV dose from the primary series was administered-112

tr.td: Second HPV dose from the primary series was administered

td.a: Second HPV dose from the primary series was administered and client's HIV status is positive or client is immunocompromised-178

tr.td: Second HPV dose from the primary series was administered and client's HIV status is positive or client is immunocompromised

td.a: Third HPV dose from the primary series was administered-112

tr.td: Third HPV dose from the primary series was administered

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SHPV2Doses for IMMZ.D18.S.HPV.2-dose schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a human papillomavirus (HPV) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: 2-dose schedule
